meanings.definition: The state or quality of being uproarious.
meanings.sent1: The uproariousnesses of the party filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: Her laughter echoed with uproariousnesses throughout the house.
meanings.sent3: The children's uproariousnesses at the playground made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The uproariousnesses of the comedy show left the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent5: The uproariousnesses of the celebration could be heard from miles away.

meanings.definition: The act or instance of being uproarious.
meanings.sent1: The uproariousnesses of their performance brought tears of laughter.
meanings.sent2: The uproariousnesses of the crowd made the event unforgettable.
meanings.sent3: His sudden uproariousnesses during the meeting surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The uproariousnesses of the situation were contagious, spreading joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The uproariousnesses of the prank were captured on video for all to see.

meanings.sent1: The uproariousnesses of his personality always livened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The uproariousnesses of the situation were hard to ignore.
meanings.sent3: Her natural uproariousnesses made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: The uproariousnesses of the comedy club drew in a large audience.
meanings.sent5: The uproariousnesses of the movie had everyone laughing until their sides hurt.
